# [Interview #590: Tor Q&A with Brandon Sanderson, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=590#25)

#### [Maru Nui ()](http://www.tor.com/blogs/2010/12/open-call-for-brandon-sanderson-questions#149097)

What would an atium-electrum alloy do in Allomancy?

#### [Brandon Sanderson ()](http://www.tor.com/blogs/2011/01/your-questions-for-brandon-sanderson-answered)

The alloys of atium have various temporal effects.
